description: IT’S BENGHAZI DAY ON THE HILL And we’re likely going to hear nothing new. But what we see in how Hillary Clinton handles the questions, even if we’ve heard her answers before, may be the biggest takeaway of this event, The Washington Post reports – and even push the needle some on her presidential campaign. […]
title: It’s Benghazi Day! Plus a prison raid on the Islamic State, and signs China and Russia are cooling off
